instructions.1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Butter the bottom and sides of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
instructions.2: Saute onions in the butter until translucent and soft.
instructions.3: Cook and drain lasagna as per package directions.
instructions.4: Make potatoes as per package directions for 12 servings. Combine the onions with the potatoes.
instructions.5: Place a layer of noodles over the bottom of the baking dish. Cover with a layer of potatoes, sprinkle with cheese and pats of butter. Repeat ending with noodles sprinkling top with cheese and butter. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 1 hour.

questions.question: In Step 4, is the onions from Step 2 being used?
Is onions from Step 2 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is potatoes from Step 4 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is package directions from Step 3 still available in Step 5?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 5?
If we skip Step 2, is it still valid to combine the onions in Step 4?
Can we saute (Step 2) and place (Step 5) at the same time?
